Amenity space should be spread throughout the development to avoid the burden of it falling on one tenure. 14.68 Amenity space should be easily accessible from residential entrances and should be well overlooked. The primary communal amenity space in a development should be located outdoors. Part of PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES the communal amenity space should promote physical activity such as outdoor gyms or gardening, and part should encourage rest and relaxation.
